Package search

Class SearchEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • search.SearchEngine
  • public class SearchEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchEngine is class provides search capabilities small datasets of free text fields.

    • Field Summary

      HashMap between Id document to HashMap how many times each word appears in the document.
      protected java.util.Map<DataId,​java.lang.String> idDocTextMap
